main_image.description: This project was my introduction to 3D modeling, and I had to learn Blender from scratch. My primary focus was the robot itself, but I also did a lot of work with the mountain cliff and its surrounding details. I started with basic shapes, using simple geometry to build a solid, functional design. The body began as a cylinder, with rectangular blocks for the limbs. After the main structure was complete, I refined the model by adding details like lamps and components to give it a more industrial, futuristic feel. The design aimed for simplicity with an advanced edge, resembling a robot from a futuristic military force. Finally, blood spatters were added to the metal textures, suggesting a darker backstory.

description: This Blender project marked my first experience with 3D modeling, where I, and two auther team members, created a dramatic scene featuring a robot perched on a snow-covered mountain peak. The main focus was split between crafting the rugged mountain landscape and designing the robot itself. I began with basic geometric shapes to form the robot's structure, refining it with intricate details like lamps and mechanical components to give it a futuristic, military feel. The scene was further enriched by a weathered door placed beside the robot, adding an element of mystery. To convey a darker backstory, I applied blood spatters to the robot's metal surface, hinting at a violent or tragic event. The heavy snowfall and moody lighting were crucial in setting the tone, creating a tense and atmospheric environment. This project was a major step in learning Blender and 3D design, allowing me to explore both technical and creative challenges.
description_short: A Blender project that created a dramatic scene featuring a robot on a snowy mountain peak, complete with intricate details and atmospheric elements.
